name: Agently
description: Agently transforms artificial intelligence into an accessible, dynamic, and powerful ally for businesses and individuals. By offering a no-code platform, Agently empowers users of all skill levels to create and customize AI Agents tailored to their needs, delivering accuracy with proprietary Anti-Hallucination algorithms. With seamless integration across diverse deployment options and purpose-built housing products, Agently ensures AI Agents are impactful and adaptable. Innovative features like the create-and-earn marketplace enable users to monetize their AI creations, while the groundbreaking AI Agency fosters collaboration among multiple AI Agents to solve complex tasks. Agently makes AI more than a tool—it’s a game-changing partner in productivity, innovation, and growth.
